TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PrintingNotSupportedException extends System.Printing.PrintSystemException

summary.span: 不支援列印作業時所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a printing operation is not supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 類別內命名空間不支援為 Windows 服務或 ASP.NET 應用程式或服務中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 嘗試使用這些類別時，這些應用程式類型的其中一個內可能會產生無法預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務的效能和執行階段例外狀況。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果您想要從 Windows Form 應用程式列印，請參閱命名空間。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 以系統提供的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如"DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply"這個訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply" This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified message that describes the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||`message` 中指定的錯誤訊息字串。The error message string specified in `message`.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context
param.span: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 使用序列化資料，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 參數不是 ，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||`message` 中指定的錯誤訊息字串。The error message string specified in `message`.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
